nodes.text: Zhailaut was a male Wookiee that lived in the village of Kachirho on Kashyyyk during the Galactic Civil War and loosely associated with a Wookiee resistance group. In 1 ABY, Zhailaut sent a spacer and the Bothan Gursan Bryes to kill the Trandoshan slaver Cyssc Blackscale.

Zhailaut appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-roleplaying game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
